name: Djembe Mania !
description:
Description

Djembe Mania is an endless casual game made by 1D Game team, during this tropical journey you'll have to keep an eye of all the fruits and be sure they don't move out of the circle, if only one does, it's over ! To do so, you'll have to rotate around with your Djembe !

Keep the drumming ON as long as possible and try to get as much fruits as possible like coconut or banana for your fruit salad !! Good Luck !

Controls

Touch the sides of the screen to rotate the Djembe over the circle.
